tHG86c1UFuKLGyisD.name: Single-Minded
tHG86c1UFuKLGyisD.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

mW4co8SPFVOtEW0ZS.name: Specialized
mW4co8SPFVOtEW0ZS.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

mLcppyJ_3wjlhDYjf.name: Reaction Bonus
mLcppyJ_3wjlhDYjf.notes: Students of the arcane, gullible college students, monster-hunters.

mkX9ZGxzd9fiy2gKN.name: Alternative Benefit
mkX9ZGxzd9fiy2gKN.notes: +1/level to Fright Checks caused by supernatural beings and effects, and by reading sanity-destroying tomes (because you know what to expect).
